query.statement: SELECT * FROM TableWithAllDataTypes WHERE ([String] = @stringProperty OR @stringProperty IS NULL) AND ([Byte] >= @bytePropertyFrom OR @bytePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([Byte] <= @bytePropertyTo OR @bytePropertyTo IS NULL) AND [Enum] = @enumProperty AND ([ExtensibleEnum] = @extensibleEnumProperty OR @extensibleEnumProperty IS NULL) AND ([Date] >= @datePropertyFrom OR @datePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([Date] <= @datePropertyTo OR @datePropertyTo IS NULL) AND ([DateTime] >= @dateTimePropertyFrom OR @dateTimePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([DateTime] <= @dateTimePropertyTo OR @dateTimePropertyTo IS NULL);
